content: *one of our menagerie of amigurumi animals our little princess is sure to be a favorite lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 70538ad skill level easy + 1 ball each a 620-099 wool-ease yarn fisherman b 410-098 ruffles yarn cream *yarn discontinued* c 620-153 wool-ease yarn black crochet hook - size h-8 5 mm split ring stitch markers fiberfill stuffing design features surface crochet with ruffles yarn some construction required to finish
